SEARCH
Package users

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
users.User
users.Admin
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserManagement
public class Admin extends User implements UserManagement
Public admin class This class contains the logic and the attributes of the Admin The principal function of the admin is add the people which is going to vote in the program Add Songs or delete them from the program. Use singletone Patron, because there's only one Admin
